definitions.definition: An item of furniture composed of modular sections; usually specifically a sectional sofa .
A sectional chart, a type of map used for navigation in the air.
A tournament or match held at the section level, typically between the regionals and the championships .
A band sectional , in which one section of a band or orchestra practices separately.

main_definition: An item of furniture composed of modular sections; usually specifically a sectional sofa .
secondary_definitions: ( aviation ) A sectional chart, a type of map used for navigation in the air.
( sports ) A tournament or match held at the section level, typically between the regionals and the championships .
( music ) A band sectional , in which one section of a band or orchestra practices separately.
